/templates.summary: Path used to manage the list of templates.
/templates.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `template` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `template` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `template` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `template`.

/templates/{name}.summary: Path used to manage a single template.
/templates/{name}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of a `template`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `template`.

/agreements.summary: Path used to manage the list of agreements.
/agreements.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `agreement` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `agreement` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `agreement` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `agreement`.

/agreements/{agreementId}.summary: Path used to manage a single agreement.
/agreements/{agreementId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of a `agreement`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `agreement`.

/agreements/{agreementId}/convert/pdf.summary: Path used to convert an agreeement to PDF format.
/agreements/{agreementId}/convert/pdf.description: The REST endpoint/path used convert or render an `agreement` to PDF format.
